decks.notes: This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the board with various spells and enchantments. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms while disrupting their strategy with cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble. The goal is to establish board presence and control by utilizing the ramping abilities of Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to achieve victory through sheer power and overwhelming force.

The deck focuses on using various cards to quickly assemble a game-winning combo by sacrificing creatures like Allosaurus Rider to fetch powerful threats like Griselbrand, Atraxa, or Ghalta. It utilizes cards like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to tutor for key pieces, while also providing protection with Pact of Negation. The deck also includes cards like Generous Ent and Disciple of Freyalise to ramp up mana quickly. Overall, the strategy is to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with a big threat before they have a chance to react.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on generating value from graveyard interactions and utilizing aggressive creatures to pressure opponents early on. By combining cards that disrupt opponent's hands with efficient removal spells, the deck aims to maintain board control while steadily building its own threats. Utilizing graveyard recursion with cards like Cauldron Familiar and Stitcher's Supplier, the deck can outvalue opponents in longer games. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Ygra, Eater of All and Emperor of Bones allow the deck to close out games quickly once it gains control of the battlefield.

This Boros Aggro deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells. By quickly deploying threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while controlling the board with cards like Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and dictate the pace of the game. With a focus on efficient creatures and disruption, supported by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm, the deck looks to swiftly reduce the opponent's life total and secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing land ramp and mana acceleration to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to ramp into a powerful Primeval Titan. By utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor and Simic Growth Chamber to generate extra mana and untap lands, players can quickly search for key lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Vesuva to deal massive damage. The deck also includes a toolbox of lands and spells to help control the board and protect the combo, ensuring a swift and explosive victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Ardent Plea and Street Wraith to cycle through the deck quickly, setting up for a powerful Living End combo to mass reanimate creatures from the graveyard. The deck contains various creatures with cycling abilities to ensure a smooth setup for the combo, as well as spell cards like Force of Negation for protection. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a sudden surge of creatures while disrupting their game plan with control elements like Subtlety and Endurance. The deck aims to win through a quick and unexpected combo finish.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is disruption and aggression. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Kozilek's Command, and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan, along with aggressive creatures like Emperor of Bones and Nethergoyf, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent while also controlling the board. The inclusion of cards like Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth and Prismatic Vista help to ensure consistent mana fixing and enable powerful mana-ramping plays. The deck also includes some utility cards like Shadowspear and Nihil Spellbomb to further disrupt the opponent's strategy.

The deck is focused on utilizing Amulet of Vigor with lands like Simic Growth Chamber and Crumbling Vestige to ramp up mana quickly and efficiently. The aim is to get Primeval Titan onto the battlefield as soon as possible to search for more lands and trigger powerful abilities. With cards like Urza's Saga and Gruul Turf, the deck can generate huge amounts of mana and create explosive turns to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Scapeshift and Summoner's Pact further enhance the deck's ability to quickly assemble powerful combos and outpace the opponent.
